Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake post circulating on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Kolkata Metro came out in support of passengers who thrashed a young couple based on a comment made by the official Kolkata Metro page. However, it is later revealed that the comment was likely a mistake made by the person handling the page.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Kolkata Metro strongly condemns the incident and is against moral policing, as stated by their official Facebook post.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is provided, suggesting that the comment made by Kolkata Metro was a mistake made by the person handling the page and not an endorsement of the passengers' actions.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by initially stating that Kolkata Metro is enquiring into the incident, even though no complaint has been lodged by anyone.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
